attributes.action: Increase MP tax rates to 1.5 so they can understand how much new taxes annoy the general public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After reading in the newspaper about the new decision to introduce new bin tax to everyone but MP's is but another way the government is trying to undermine the general public. We are petitioning you the prime minister to make ALL mp's pay 1.5x the normal tax rate and a promise that it won't be payed through allowences and the taxpayers money. We dont see why we should have to pay and they dont, if you refuse it just shows how much of a draconian government you are.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
